item.title: Share Folders between Windows Host and Linux Guest OS
item.description: My laptop was purchased in 2001 configured with i5 2nd Generation, 8+2 GB RAM. I started having issues when the keyboard gives random inputs and the battery is dead. It still works good on linux and Windows 7. I couldn’t do anything on terminal when the keyboard gives random inputs.
